amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 35, 37, 44, 60, 63, 69, 71, 80, 84, 86, 87, 91, 94, 109, 110, 117, 130, 137, and 140 contained in House Report 112-485 and printed on pages H3061-3064 of the Congressional Record for May 17, 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-485 offered en bloc: Nos. 35, 37, 44, 60, 63, 69, 71, 80, 84, 86, 87, 91, 94, 109, 110, 117, 130, 137, and 140.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Mr. McKeon.
